entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Nakusp
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 a.m. PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nakusp 1:00 PM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
Temperature: 6.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 4.5°C
Wind: S 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers except snow over higher terrain early this afternoon. Risk of thunderstorms this afternoon. Snow level rising to 1000 metres this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers and flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1300 metres in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
